title: please help i cannot buy my rp "you have encountered and error.please try again later "
body: this need to be solved quick because i need to buy stuff and riot doesnt let me {{summoner:3}} {{item:3901}}

replies.body: There might be an issue with the payment method processing, or something else.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can see what's going on and find some options for you.  We'll see you there!
